text: James Mayer de Rothschild, Baron de Rothschild (15 May 1792 â€“ 15 November 1868), born Jakob Mayer Rothschild, was a German-French banker. He was the founder of the French branch of the Rothschild family.Niall Ferguson, The House of Rothschild (1999) p 87ff.Muhlstein (1983) ==References== Category:1792 births Category:1868 deaths Category:French philanthropists Category:French bankers Category:German bankers Category:German philanthropists Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:French Jews Category:German Jews Category:Rothschild family
